nodes.text: A Full System was one of the best hands in a card game played between Han Solo and a former Imperial scout. In 4 ABY, Solo and the man agreed to wager the Millennium Falcon against a crystal and holomap to Seoul 5. The scout played a Full System, but Solo still managed to win the round. Subsequently, Solo was accused of cheating, and a fight broke out.
A Full System first appeared in the Legends comic book Star Wars 84, which was written by Roy Richardson, pencilled by David Mazzucchelli, and published in 1984.
